item.title: Upgrade to the Identity Engine
item.description: Upgrade to the Identity Engine Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Content type: Dynamic Index A dynamic index is an automatically generated list of links to topics immediately beneath it based purely on the site’s structure, or with some level of filtering. A blind list of summaries and links to child docs. For example: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/authorization/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/api-security/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/manage-users/

item.title: Upgrade SAML apps to SHA256
item.description: Upgrade SAML apps to SHA256 Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Upgrade SAML apps to SHA256: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/updating-saml-cert/main/ Content type: How-to: developer focused A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code. How-tos tend to walk the reader step by step through administrative tasks but not exclusively. They might include code snippets such as API requests and responses, or outline how to develop the required solution but without walking through the majority of the code required to implement it.
